data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Shamli. Through your servants plant 21 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shamli, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,180 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
God, we pray for the believers in Shamli, Uttar Pradesh, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Shamli, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Lakhera people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Shamli, Uttar Pradesh, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 107,300 people living in Shamli.
Father, help the 1,180 believers in Shamli to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
